text: Angga Febryanto Putra (born February 4, 1995) is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays as a forward for Liga 3 club Persibat Batang. ==Club career== ===Persib Bandung=== He made his professional debut in the Liga 1 on April 22, 2017 against PS TNI. ==References== ==External links== * Angga Febryanto at Liga-Indonesia * Angga Febryanto at Soccerway Category:Living people Category:1995 births Category:Association football forwards Category:Indonesian footballers Category:Liga 1 (Indonesia) players Category:Sportspeople from Surabaya Category:Persib Bandung players
title: Angga Febryanto Putra
